attributes.action: No Christmas Adverts before 25th November each year
attributes.additional_details: By signing this e-petition, you agree that there should be a ban on Christmas adverts before 25th November each year. It is ridiculous to have Christmas adverts as early as April (I am not joking - there have actually been some Christmas adverts in April). Having early Christmas adverts makes Christmas consumerist and loses the true meaning of Chrsitmas - "Good will to all men" not "high profits to all companies".
